title: Explore your R libraries
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(libminer) ## basic example code  lib_summary() #>                                                                                        library #> 1                        /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-x86_64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/nl/ygr54ppn1w9_p1y69y7j_g_0pgsz0m/T/RtmplaBfgi/temp_libpath917d376411fd #>   n_packages #> 1        255 #> 2          1  #Also with computed file sizes lib_summary(TRUE) #>                                                                                        library #> 1                        /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/4.3-x86_64/Resources/library #> 2 /private/var/folders/nl/ygr54ppn1w9_p1y69y7j_g_0pgsz0m/T/RtmplaBfgi/temp_libpath917d376411fd #>   n_packages  lib_size #> 1        255 614504104 #> 2          1     14510
